abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column on inaugural Vegas 16 tournament, second-tier college basketball tournament created for teams that were not invited to NCAA tournament; says most players were happy to be invited and excited about prospect of ending their season with one final March highlight.
lead_paragraph: The Vegas 16 tournament, created this year to attract teams that were not invited to the N.C.A.A. tournament, is the newest event in the increasingly crowded postseason.

headline.print_headline: A Bet on Basketball and, Someday, Higher Ticket Sales
headline.main: At Vegas 16, a Bet on Basketball and, Someday, Greater Ticket Sales

snippet: The Vegas 16 tournament, created this year to attract teams that were not invited to the N.C.A.A. tournament, is the newest event in the increasingly crowded postseason....
